title: Five-Star Central Guangzhou City Stay with Glittering Outdoor Pool
description: Discover the many wonders of Guangzhou with a five-star stay at Crowne Plaza Guangzhou City Centre, an IHG Hotel. Find yourself where the ancient world and the ultra-modern collide in the heart of the city's vibrant downtown, where authentic eateries, fashionable boutiques and impressive architecture line the streets. Within your stylish base, indulge in Cantonese cuisine at BaiYueLou, plunge into the glimmering pool or find your daily dose of movement in the fitness centre.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Guangzhou City Centre, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: 339 Huanshi Road East, Yuexiu District, Guangzhou, 510098, Mainland China
